title: coolsv
author: coolsv
content: Need Help with Android app , in that app there are video which i want to download and  there is watching restriction on that video , so if you can help me to get those video files i will pay you. No upfront payment. Contact  tele - @oscar4848

comments.author: IIrik11
comments.body: if u can play them, u can screen-record them.they loose a bit of quality but something is better than nothing i guess.i may or may not be able to help but i'd need to know which app u r talking about first.u can send me a pm if u don't want to reveal the app here. i allow newbies to send messages.i don't use telegram.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: coolsv on April 21, 2023, 04:40:17 AMNeed Help with Android app , in that app there are video which i want to download and  there is watching restriction on that video , so if you can help me to get those video files i will pay you. No upfront payment.That's not how it works given your current reputation.1. You have to let one know of the app and the videos you need so that they can be sure if they can do the task.2. Let them know how much you are willing to pay and how payment will be done.3. Upfront payment for a trusted member. Their reputation will be way more valuable that what you are planning to pay them.

comments.author: coolsv
comments.body: Quote from: IIrik11 on April 21, 2023, 11:19:03 AMif u can play them, u can screen-record them.they loose a bit of quality but something is better than nothing i guess.i may or may not be able to help but i'd need to know which app u r talking about first.u can send me a pm if u don't want to reveal the app here. i allow newbies to send messages.i don't use telegram.No the app have flagsecure you can't take screenshot or record the screen , thats why I need help

comments.author: coolsv
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on April 21, 2023, 11:50:02 AMQuote from: coolsv on April 21, 2023, 04:40:17 AMNeed Help with Android app , in that app there are video which i want to download and  there is watching restriction on that video , so if you can help me to get those video files i will pay you. No upfront payment.That's not how it works given your current reputation.1. You have to let one know of the app and the videos you need so that they can be sure if they can do the task.2. Let them know how much you are willing to pay and how payment will be done.3. Upfront payment for a trusted member. Their reputation will be way more valuable that what you are planning to pay them.It's Educational app in that they are some course videos I want to download (need video file to see in pc) , in that we can't watch video more than 2 time even if download in app and watch offline on app, you can't take screenshot or record the screen.And if you help me then only I can pay after that no upfront payment

comments.author: Stedsm
comments.body: Quote from: coolsv on April 22, 2023, 06:22:14 AMQuote from: IIrik11 on April 21, 2023, 11:19:03 AMif u can play them, u can screen-record them.they loose a bit of quality but something is better than nothing i guess.i may or may not be able to help but i'd need to know which app u r talking about first.u can send me a pm if u don't want to reveal the app here. i allow newbies to send messages.i don't use telegram.No the app have flagsecure you can't take screenshot or record the screen , thats why I need helpLol, if you can't record the screen, why don't you use another phone to record that video by playing it on your main phone or PC?And if it's an educational app, I believe you're not allowed to do this because it may be a paid video of some course and they don't want it to be leaked because then, nobody will purchase their course but rather buy the recorded one for cheap if you or someone that records it, decides to sell it of course.

comments.author: coolsv
comments.body: Quote from: Stedsm on April 22, 2023, 06:38:40 AMQuote from: coolsv on April 22, 2023, 06:22:14 AMQuote from: IIrik11 on April 21, 2023, 11:19:03 AMif u can play them, u can screen-record them.they loose a bit of quality but something is better than nothing i guess.i may or may not be able to help but i'd need to know which app u r talking about first.u can send me a pm if u don't want to reveal the app here. i allow newbies to send messages.i don't use telegram.No the app have flagsecure you can't take screenshot or record the screen , thats why I need helpLol, if you can't record the screen, why don't you use another phone to record that video by playing it on your main phone or PC?And if it's an educational app, I believe you're not allowed to do this because it may be a paid video of some course and they don't want it to be leaked because then, nobody will purchase their course but rather buy the recorded one for cheap if you or someone that records it, decides to sell it of course.Not everybody wants to sell it and make money , I need it because the course is tough and even if u watch 2 times it's not sufficient , and if I solve question bank and if I get query I want to see the video again that why I need it

comments.author: Stedsm
comments.body: Quote from: coolsv on April 22, 2023, 06:54:54 AMNot everybody wants to sell it and make money , I need it because the course is tough and even if u watch 2 times it's not sufficient , and if I solve question bank and if I get query I want to see the video again that why I need itI've not targeted you specifically when I said that ^someone^ may do it to sell it for cheap, it's common sense mate. Next, I've already given you the solution. Let me ask you this:When you play the video, does it need to be continuously running without taking it back or front? I mean, when you said you can play it 2 times, you can't drag the video a few minutes back or front? If you can, then watching it 2 times is enough because you can have your pen and paper and still solve your questions while pausing it and/or dragging it back and front wherever you see your queries being resolved in the video.One more thing, is it allowed to be watched 2 times for free per device?If yes, why don't you use multiple devices and/or use BlueStacks and change IP inside and watch it?There are so many alternatives available that you really don't need to record it, if you don't need it later of course.

comments.author: Bushdark
comments.body: Quote from: coolsv on April 21, 2023, 04:40:17 AMNeed Help with Android app , in that app there are video which i want to download and  there is watching restriction on that video , so if you can help me to get those video files i will pay you. No upfront payment. Contact  tele - @oscar4848 You don't need to bother yourself on that, I can help you if you don't mind. You can send me a PM with link to the video. I will download it for you with my inbuilt software. I hope the length of the video is not more than an hour to make work easier for me.

comments.author: coolsv
comments.body: Quote from: Stedsm on April 22, 2023, 07:06:11 AMQuote from: coolsv on April 22, 2023, 06:54:54 AMNot everybody wants to sell it and make money , I need it because the course is tough and even if u watch 2 times it's not sufficient , and if I solve question bank and if I get query I want to see the video again that why I need itI've not targeted you specifically when I said that ^someone^ may do it to sell it for cheap, it's common sense mate. Next, I've already given you the solution. Let me ask you this:When you play the video, does it need to be continuously running without taking it back or front? I mean, when you said you can play it 2 times, you can't drag the video a few minutes back or front? If you can, then watching it 2 times is enough because you can have your pen and paper and still solve your questions while pausing it and/or dragging it back and front wherever you see your queries being resolved in the video.One more thing, is it allowed to be watched 2 times for free per device?If yes, why don't you use multiple devices and/or use BlueStacks and change IP inside and watch it?There are so many alternatives available that you really don't need to record it, if you don't need it later of course.Yes I can drag or drop but still it has been watched only for 2 times , no it's not free I have to purchase the course for that then only I can watch it only for 2 time, it won't work on BlueStacks or any other Android imulator

comments.author: coolsv
comments.body: Quote from: Bushdark on April 22, 2023, 11:06:21 AMQuote from: coolsv on April 21, 2023, 04:40:17 AMNeed Help with Android app , in that app there are video which i want to download and  there is watching restriction on that video , so if you can help me to get those video files i will pay you. No upfront payment. Contact  tele - @oscar4848 You don't need to bother yourself on that, I can help you if you don't mind. You can send me a PM with link to the video. I will download it for you with my inbuilt software. I hope the length of the video is not more than an hour to make work easier for me. It's an app in that there are videos around 50+ each have minimum of 1 hour play time.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: coolsv on April 22, 2023, 05:16:49 PMYes I can drag or drop but still it has been watched only for 2 times , no it's not free I have to purchase the course for that then only I can watch it only for 2 time, it won't work on BlueStacks or any other Android imulatorMust be a shitty educational app. Why limit someone on the number of times they have to watch a video even after they have paid?I hope it's not Udemy. Bought a couple of courses in there and I can go through them anytime I want repeatedly. Maybe you can also explore some alternatives in the long run.Unfortunately, I can't help... Good luck.
